1.name: Quo Vadis?
1.description: An epic Italian film "Quo Vadis" influenced many of the later movies.

2.name: Der Student von Prag
2.description: Balduin, a student of Prague, leaves his roystering companions in the beer garden, when he finds he has reached the end of his resources. He is scarcely seated in a quiet corner when a ...                See full summary »

3.name: Fantômas - À l'ombre de la guillotine
3.description: Inspector Juve is tasked to investigate and capture an infamous criminal Fantomas.

4.name: Gli ultimi giorni di Pompei
4.description: Two love triangles intersect in ancient Pompei.

5.name: Robin Hood
5.description: Robin Hood and his followers aid the poor and oppressed from their hideout in Sherwood Forest, pursued by the Sheriff of Nottingham.

6.name: Ingeborg Holm
6.description: Single mother is separated from her children due to financial struggles.

7.name: Germinal
7.description: The mechanic Etienne Lantier is a competent workman out of a job, whose tempestuous disposition is more than atoned for by a good heart. With bundle in hand he looks for work from town to ...                See full summary »

8.name: The Battle of Gettysburg
8.description: A young woman's sweetheart fights for the Union, while her brother fights for the Confederates, in the pivotal 1863 battle of the U.S. Civil War.

9.name: Ivanhoe
9.description: Back from a crusade, the hero of Sir Walter Scott's novel fights for courtly love and Saxon honor.

10.name: Caprice
10.description: A wealthy young man's marriage to a mountain girl he meets while hunting is disastrous until she abandons him and later reappears incognito as a tutored and sophisticated woman.

11.name: What 80 Million Women Want
11.description: A suffragist exposes a corrupt political boss who had compromised her lawyer fiancé.

12.name: Traffic in Souls
12.description: A woman, with the aid of her police officer sweetheart, endeavors to uncover the prostitution ring that has kidnapped her sister, and the philanthropist who secretly runs it.

13.name: Shadows of the Moulin Rouge
13.description: A Parisian doctor, infatuated with the wife of his benefactor, drugs and kidnaps her, and tries to convince the husband that she is dead.

14.name: Juve contre Fantômas
14.description: In Part Two of Louis Feuillade's 5 1/2-hour epic follows FantÃ'mas, the criminal lord of Paris, master of disguise, the creeping assassin in black, as he is pursued by the equally resourceful Inspector Juve.

15.name: Le mort qui tue
15.description: After a body disappears from inside the prison, a series of crimes take place, all seemingly by the dead man. With Juve presumed dead, Fandor must investigate alone. Will Fantomas finally be brought to justice?

16.name: The Count of Monte Cristo
16.description: A French sailor, imprisoned for years on false charges of conpiring against the king, escapes and exacts revenge on his accusers.

17.name: From Dusk to Dawn
17.description: An employee of an iron works is fired as a dangerous agitator, and after his friend dies in an explosion at the iron works, he runs for governor on a labor ticket.

18.name: L'enfant de Paris
18.description: The young daughter of an army captain missing in action runs away from school and is kidnapped by Parisian lowlifes. When the kidnapper flees to Nice with the child, the kind-hearted employee of one of his accomplices sets off in pursuit.

19.name: The Prisoner of Zenda
19.description: King Rudolf of Ruritania is saved from a coup attempt by the help of his lookalike cousin, who falls in love with the king's fiancee.

20.name: Richard Wagner
20.description: The story of the great German composer, from his childhood through his great triumphs in orchestral and operatic music.

22.name: The Stranglers of Paris
22.description: A French peasant, unknown to his innocent daughter, becomes the leader of the murderous "Stranglers of Paris".

23.name: Die Suffragette
23.description: Nelly's mother is a suffragette and persuades her daughter to join the good cause. Placing a bomb under Lord William's chair love develops between the two.

24.name: Halvblod
24.description: The story of two men and their rivalry for the attention of a dancer, and the events that follow.

25.name: His Neighbor's Wife
25.description: Mr. Norton discovers his wife in the arms of his neighbor, Captain Roberts, a married man. His first maddened impulse is to kill his faithless wife, but on his way for the gun his little ...                See full summary »

26.name: Marc'Antonio e Cleopatra
26.description: After the murder of her lover Julius Caesar, Egypt's queen Cleopatra needs a new ally. She seduces his probable successor Mark Antony. This develops into real love and slowly leads to a war with the other possible successor, Octavius.

27.name: Le avventure straordinarissime di Saturnino Farandola
27.description: Episode 2: "Zingo and the White Elephant" Zingo and his wife, Sari, who are returning from their adventures in Mexico, when Zingo learns from his newspaper that the Royal Elephant of Siam ...                See full synopsis »

28.name: The Sea Wolf
28.description: The cruel captain of a schooner dominates the shipwreck victims he picks up.

29.name: Ten Nights in a Barroom
29.description: A mill owner loses his mortgage, and the life of his child, because of his drinking problem.

30.name: Les misérables - Époque 1: Jean Valjean
30.description: The story begins with Jean Valjean as a humble worker endeavoring to provide for his invalid mother. They live in a squalid home, made more wretched by his inability to provide sufficient ...                See full summary »

31.name: Ben Bolt
31.description: Ben wins the hand of a prosperous merchant's daughter by finding the father's lost trading ship, but not before a rival suitor lays several traps along the way.

32.name: Atlantis
32.description: After Dr. Friedrich's wife becomes mentally unstable and his research papers are rejected, he leaves the country to respite.

33.name: Jone ovvero gli ultimi giorni di Pompei
33.description: Based on the Edward Bulwer-Lytton novel. Set in the shadows of Mt. Vesuvius just before its famous eruption.

34.name: Sumerki zhenskoy dushi
34.description: A young, rich woman decides to dedicate her life to helping the poor, but a tragic incident changes her life.

35.name: Tess of the D'Urbervilles
35.description: A peasant girl sent to make a claim on her family's ancestral home in England's Wessex is seduced and left with child by its current owner.

36.name: The Adventures of Kathlyn
36.description: The daughter of an adventurer in India is kidnapped by a native king, whom she is forced to marry. She has several adventures battling natives and wild animals.

37.name: Lime Kiln Club Field Day
37.description: Modeled after a popular collection of stories known as "Brother Gardener's Lime Kiln Club," the plot features three suitors vying to win the hand of the local beauty.

38.name: David Copperfield
38.description: A gentle orphan discovers life and love in an indifferent adult world.

39.name: Volunteer Organist
39.description: Two brothers, one an alcoholic and the other a minister, are reunited after the latter is shunned by his congregation for falling in love with a saloon keeper's daughter.

40.name: Les misérables - Époque 2: Fantine
40.description: Jean Valjean, guilty of a minor theft of food, is pursued and hounded for years by a relentless lawman, Javert.

41.name: Sodoms Ende
41.description: A tragedy of an artistic life in Berlin.

42.name: Der Feind im Land
42.description: The scene opens in a railway station in France. Henri Marteau, the station master, Marie, his wife, and his little daughter are living happily. War is declared with Prussia and Marteau is ...                See full summary »

43.name: Zigomar, peau d'anguille - Épisode 1: La résurrection de Zigomar
43.description: Paulin Broquet, the great Parisian detective, has brought the notorious bandit, Zigomar, to justice. Determined not to let the law punish him, he had taken poison in the Hall of Justice. ...                See full summary »

44.name: The Man from the Golden West
44.description: A bank clerk who becomes wealthy after backing a California gold prospector, is implicated in the death of a detective who was investigating his corrupt business partner.

48.name: Das Recht auf Dasein
48.description: An ex-convict is believed guilty of having attacked a woman, when in fact he tried to help her. Escaping the police he ends in a physician's practice where they meet again, only she became amnesic and cannot recognize him.

50.name: The Port of Doom
50.description: Detective Kate Kirby discovers that a ship captain has been sent on a doomed voyage by his rival for the affections of the shipowner's daughter.
